main.name: I am James
main.bio: A senior software developer with great experiences, always prioritize inovation and trustworthy and come up with the agile approach. I'm passionate in this industry and I alway take responsibility for my own on going professional development wihch I believe will help my customer's business stay at the forefrontend of this position with my qualifications, experiences and creativity.
main.contactmessage: You can touch on me easily through.

education.description: My education at CCT encouraged grow my passions for web develop and programming. The course includes computer architecture, operating systems, procedural and process - oriented programming, programming microprocessors, programming architecture, client-server systems, visual programming tools, computer networks, organization of databases. I came up with the agile approach for my develop team and will carry the same dedication and focus into future commitments.

work.title: Frontend Web Developer
work.description: Worked with various clients to build websites ranging from start-ups to enterprises. Oered consulting to improve development practice and processes. Tackled challenging problems and implemented solutions with the overall software quality in mind. Stack includes React, Redux, Firebase, Typescript, Flow and other common React libraries.

work.company: The Medical Affairs Company (TMAC) Contract Full-time
work.title: Senior Frontend Developer
Full-stack Developer
work.description: Multi-tenant application, allowing multiple organisations to register and get access to their own area. Design and build databases for the management of patients and the medical records in MonogoDB database. Developed website with Node JS Framework and React.js

work.title: Web Application Developer
work.description: My team consisted of front-end and back-end QA Engineers, Architects, UI/UX Designers, Product Owners, and Business Analysts

work.title: Web Application Developer
work.description: Supported the migration of an existing application to React js/Nuxt.js. Developed a methodology to gradually transition legacy a jQuery application to React/Redux. Implemented payment UI and API integration for both depositing funds and withdrawals. Found and fixed various rendering performance issues in the app.
